means: （指某人曾经是…）从前的，一度的

sentence.Network_en: I told you, man! It'll be sometime after eight o'clock.
sentence.Network_cn: 老兄，我告诉过你了，时间是八点以后。

sentence.Network_en: Cecile was in her early thirties, a sometime actress, dancer and singer.
sentence.Network_cn: 塞茜尔三十出头，曾经做过演员、舞蹈演员和歌手。

sentence.Network_en: The sales figures won't be released until sometime next month.
sentence.Network_cn: 下个月的某个时间才会公布销售数据。

PerfectNetExp.abs: ... someday adv. （今后）有一天 sometime adv. （未来的）某时 sound v. 听起来.
UNIT 10. Going Home_旺旺英语教学网 ... anew 重新；再 sometime 某个时候 tide 潮汐.
我的单词：越背越过瘾 ... something pron. 某事，某物 sometime ad. 在某一时候；从前 sometimes ad. 不时，有时.
“time”用法知多少 ... At times I go out to the beach . 有时候我到海滩去。 sometime 将来某个时候 sometimes 偶尔；有时.

list.abs: they sometimes stay up all night ., 他们有时彻夜不眠.
sometimes ,... ... sometimes ：adv. 有时，间或 but sometimes 但有些时候；但有时候；但有时 Sometimes incline 时光倾斜.
CRAZY BABY_百度百科 ... But sometimes 但是，有时 We couldn’t fight to start 我们还没能很好的开始.
And then sometimes people do shitty things and sometimes our algorithms fooled., 不过有时人们会做一些可耻的事情 , 有时我们的算法会被愚弄.
When I travel , I sometimes have jet lag for days !, 当我旅行时 , 我有时需几天的时间调时差.

means.word_mean: 迟的,早的,过去的,近来的
在某一时间,适时,最终,以后,将来,很快

entry.def: You use sometime to refer to a time in the future or the past that is unknown or that has not yet been decided.

example.ex: The sales figures won't  be released until sometime next month...
example.tran: 下个月的某个时间才会公布销售数据。

example.ex: Why don't  you come and see me sometime?...
example.tran: 为什么不找个时间来看看我？

entry.tran: 前…(以前担任过某项职务)
entry.def: You use sometime to describe a job or role that a person used to have.

example.ex: Cecile was in her early thirties, a sometime actress, dancer and singer.
example.tran: 塞茜尔三十出头，曾经做过演员、舞蹈演员和歌手。

means.word_mean: 1. at some indefinite or unstated time;

sentences.sentence: "It was to be printed sometime later"

auth_sentence.content: Personally I would like to see it again sometime.
auth_sentence.res_content: Personally I would like to see it again sometime.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Personally I would like to see it again sometime.

auth_sentence.content: Try to count a hundred waves sometime and see.
auth_sentence.res_content: Try to count a hundred waves sometime and see.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Try to count a hundred waves sometime and see.

auth_sentence.content: I hope I'll see you here again sometime.
auth_sentence.res_content: I hope I'll see you here again sometime.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I hope I'll see you here again sometime.

sentences.en: We'll take our holiday sometime in August, I think.
sentences.cn: 我想我们大概会在八月放假。

sentences.en: It will happen sometime and somewhere.
sentences.cn: 有朝一日这总会在什么地方发生的。

sentences.en: Our house was built sometime around 1973.
sentences.cn: 我们的房子建于1973年左右。
上个月某个时候他曾经来过。

jushi.english: It will happen sometime and somewhere.
jushi.chinese: 有朝一日这总会在什么地方发生的。

jushi.english: Our house was built sometime around 1973.
jushi.chinese: 我们的房子建于1973年左右。

jushi.english: We'll take our holiday sometime in August,I think.
jushi.chinese: 我想我们大概会在八月放假。
